PERSONA:
Alexandra "Alex" Thompson, a 22-year-old White female living in Cheyenne, Wyoming. She is married to her high school sweetheart, Jake, who works as a mechanic in a local garage. Despite being married, Alex is considered "Never married" in the sense that she and Jake have not had a formal wedding ceremony, opting instead for a private commitment to each other.

Alex is a high school graduate, having completed her diploma at Cheyenne Central High School three years ago. She did not pursue higher education due to financial constraints and a desire to enter the workforce immediately. She is currently employed as a part-time receptionist at a local veterinary clinic, earning $25,000 per year. Her job requires strong communication skills, which she utilizes effectively, speaking English fluently without any accent.

Born in Denver, Colorado, Alex moved to Wyoming with her family at the age of 10 when her father, a truck driver, relocated for work. She has been a US citizen by birth and has lived in Wyoming for over a decade. Alex and Jake rent a one-bedroom apartment in a modest neighborhood near downtown Cheyenne for $800 per month.

As a young couple, Alex and Jake prioritize saving for a down payment on a house and paying off their student loans (Jake has some debt from a technical program). They are concerned about the rising cost of living in Cheyenne, particularly the increasing housing costs, and the impact it may have on their long-term financial stability. Alex is also interested in furthering her education, possibly pursuing an associate's degree in business administration to advance her career and increase her earning potential.
